content: @oli What would be a proper way to share my experience with trying to make a range analysis implementation? Unfortunately I've failed to do it in a free time I had, as it looks a lot like another (fortunately limited scope) mix of CTFE and salsa, but may be some summary may be useful for others
If you have a blog, writing a blog post is always a good idea. We could also consider an inside rust blog post

Writings about failures are no less importants than those about the successes. I would say they might be more important in SWE as the world doesn't end up with an artifact (code) that other people can refer to.
